Race.SpecificTitle: PW PJ Sales Tax -- 1/2% S&U - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Winn, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), under applicable constitutional and statutory authority, be authorized to levy and collect a tax of one-half of one percent (1/2%) (the "Tax"), for a period of ten (10) years, commencing January 1, 2015, upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible property and on sales of services in the Parish, as defined by law, (an estimated $900,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), with the proceeds of the Tax (after paying the costs of collecting the Tax), to be used for the purpose of improving, maintaining and repairing public roads and bridges in the Parish?
